column1: 1721|twenty-one minutes past five|He next proceeded to examine seriatim the dead man's pockets
column2: turning each of them inside out and taking the contents
column3: where they appeared adapted to his needs: for instance
column5: through the interstices of which some gold was visible; a watch
column6: which however had been injured by the explosion
column7: and had stopt just at the moment - twenty-one minutes past five - when the catastrophe took place.
